text: @CSIS #Ukraine #Russia #War #InternationalSecurityTwo years have passed since Russia's invasion of Ukraine. It's time to take stock of the situation. Join us for a virtual discussion with experts from the CSIS International Security Program to discuss the current state of the war, strategies for Ukraine and Russia, and the future of Western aid to Ukraine. Don't miss this opportunity to gain valuable insights into one of the most pressing issues of our time. #UkraineInTheBalance ðŸ‡ºðŸ‡¦ðŸ‡·ðŸ‡º
